unnormalised: Lol, mhozo chacha-ji sodanch apleak "Ex-Subedar Major R.K. Sharma, at your service!" mhunn vollokh dita, ami fokot eka rostyakodche dhabyar chai order kortana astana zallear legit. Hanv shapath gheun sangtam, kiteak mhaka dista to chaiwalyathlean voir rankacho asa!
normalised: Fulll zoraant hans, mhozo chacha-ji apleak sodanch "Ex-Subedar Major R.K. Sharma, tumchea sevek!" mhunn vollokh dita, ami fokot eka rosto-khovcheachea dhabear chai magta tevuy. Mhojea sopothacher, kednaim mhaka dista to chaiwalea porosui unch podvir asa!
